sentences.sContent: You can bet that would truly paralyze the flow of credit: Does anyone believe Washington can manage banks?
sentences.sContent_eng: You can bet that would truly paralyze the flow of credit: Does anyone believe Washington can manage banks?
sentences.sCn: 你可以打赌，这会使流动的信贷真正限于瘫痪：真有人相信华盛顿可以经营银行吗？

sentences.sContent: I think we would all agree that it is well worth it, yet many of us still choose to let this innate fear paralyze us and settle into comfortable, secure positions despite being unhappy in them.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think we would all agree that it is well worth it, yet many of us still choose to let this innate fear paralyze us and settle into comfortable, secure positions despite being unhappy in them.
sentences.sCn: 我想每个人都认同这些东西是值得的，但是我们中许多人尽管对目前处境不甚满意，仍然选择麻痹于内在的恐惧，停滞于安逸，保险的职位。

remMethod.val: para(在旁边) ＋ lyze(分开) → 身体的一边分开了 → 使瘫痪， 使麻痹

words.tran: 使麻痹；使无力；使失去勇气（paralyze的过去分词）
